bwg.french_wikipedia¶

Backstory¶

This is sample pipeline to illustrate the project. It uses a Wikipedia dump from the French Wikipedia as a basis, filtering all entries about affairs afterwards. The final corpus was then compiled manually to make sure to only include relevant articles. It was created around the time of the French elections in 2017.

The pipeline comprises the following tasks:

If you want to work with the original data, get in touch with MAJ // Digital or the creator of the dataset.

Module contents¶

NLP Pipeline tasks for french texts.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchDependencyParseTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.standard_tasks.DependencyParseTask

A luigi task dependency-parsing a sentence, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

Bases: bwg.standard_tasks.NERTask

A luigi task tagging Named Entities in a sentence, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

Bases: bwg.standard_tasks.NaiveOpenRelationExtractionTask

A luigi task performing a naive version of Open Relation Extraction on a sentence, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchParticipationExtractionTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.standard_tasks.ParticipationExtractionTask

A luigi Task performing participation extraction, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchPipelineRunInfoGenerationTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.additional_tasks.PipelineRunInfoGenerationTask

Generates information about the current run of the pipeline, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchPoSTaggingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.standard_tasks.PoSTaggingTask

A luigi task tagging a sentence with PoS tags, but it’s specifically to the french Wikipedia.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchPropertiesCompletionTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.wikipedia_tasks.PropertiesCompletionTask

A luigi Task that adds attributes from Wikidata to Named Entities, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchRelationMergingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.additional_tasks.RelationMergingTask

A luigi Task that merges extracted relations from other tasks, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

class bwg.french_wikipedia.FrenchRelationsDatabaseWritingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: bwg.additional_tasks.RelationsDatabaseWritingTask

Writes relations extracted via (naive) Open Relation Extraction and Participation Extraction into a graph database, but it’s specifically for the french Wikipedia.

MEDIA_TYPES = ['radio', 'blog', 'télévision', 'journal', 'magazine', 'radiodiffuseur', 'quotidien', 'site web', 'hebdomadaire']¶
categorize_node(label, node_data)¶

Assign a node a category out of a pre-defined set of categories. Overwritten from superclass to exactly suit this project.

Parameters:
  • label – Node label
  • node_data (dict) – Node’s data.
Tyoe label:

str
Returns:

Category for node.
Return type:

str
is_relevant_node(label, node_data)¶

Determine whether a node is relevant and should be written to the database. Overwritten from superclass to exactly suit this project.

Parameters:
  • label – Node label
  • node_data (dict) – Node’s data.
Tyoe label:

str
Returns:

Result of check.
Return type:

bool
